description: Sedge, or Carex comans, is an amazing plant species that provides a plethora of benefits. The evergreen foliage is low-maintenance and requires little to no mowing. It can withstand drought, and its color changes from striking red to deep green with the change in seasons. This fully hardy grass is an excellent habitat for wildlife, such as birds and small mammals. It also helps to improve air quality and reduce air pollution. Moreover, its roots help to prevent erosion. Sedges also have impressive cold hardiness, making them perfect for cold climates. They are an excellent choice for ground covers, low-level hedging, and general garden decor. With its many benefits, it's clear why Sedge is such an amazing plant species.
